citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
The room housing the indoor portion of the lemur enclosures (ringtail and red ruff) is in need of cleaning. There is a thick
layer of dust and dirt on the floor (can barely see the material of the flooring), the wall and objects in the room. The
window is dirty and dusty. Cobwebs have accumulated above the ringtail lemur enclosures. Dirt, dust and cobweb
accumulations can lead to pests, odors and enhance spread of disease. Premises where housing facilities are located
must be kept clean. Correct by 11/10/24.

The fencing of the wallaby yard (between the wallaby and kangaroo yards) is in need of repair. The bottom support pipe
for the metal fencing has rusted significantly and in several places has rusted through. Sharp rusted points are noted
along the support pipe. In one place it has rusted through completely. The sharp points may cause injury to the animals
housed on both sides of the fence and the structural damage may lead to instability of the fence. The outdoor housing
fences must be maintained in good repair. Correct by 11/21/24.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.84(c) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
The room housing the indoor portion of the lemur enclosures (ringtail and red ruff) is in need of cleaning. There is a thick 
layer of dust and dirt on the floor (can barely see the material of the flooring), the wall and objects in the room. The 
window is dirty and dusty. Cobwebs have accumulated above the ringtail lemur enclosures. Dirt, dust and cobweb 
accumulations can lead to pests, odors and enhance spread of disease. Premises where housing facilities are located 
must be kept clean. Correct by 11/10/24. 
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The fencing of the wallaby yard (between the wallaby and kangaroo yards) is in need of repair. The bottom support pipe 
for the metal fencing has rusted significantly and in several places has rusted through. Sharp rusted points are noted 
along the support pipe. In one place it has rusted through completely. The sharp points may cause injury to the animals 
housed on both sides of the fence and the structural damage may lead to instability of the fence. The outdoor housing 
fences must be maintained in good repair. Correct by 11/21/24. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
